text.text: Nintendo Video game console add-on Fourth 1994 GB Cartridge Gamepad

text.name: sys_description
text.text: This system works only with monochrome Game Boy cartridges, of which it converts the four levels of gray into color. SGB-stamped games will later have additional color information and custom borders. Since the game screen did not entirely fill the television, the Super Game Boy contained some by default. The adapter supports 256 colors for static screens and 12 during gameplay. Some games also have additional sound effects like Asteroids, Space Invaders and Donkey Kong '94.
